marklogic.body: Did anyone see any outward signs of damage to zimmerman,any bruises,Bleeding,redness on his face?NO nothing,nadda,zip.IfÂ zimmermanÂ was being chocked or if trayvon had a knife then there is reason to saveÂ himself by whatever means necessary.anyone see any marks?does this mean that someone who has no authority canÂ persue anyone without police and against orders from police and kill them and say OH he attacked me.after zimmy boy was told to stand down he persued anyway against orders of the contrary.ifÂ the police tell someone to leave the area and they ignore it then they are in violation and subject to arrest.this man was told to stand down but didn't so he Acted on his own.
